Review.Titre: Expert Equipment for sale.I make custom…
Review.Contenu: Expert Equipment for sale.I make custom use calculations for various purposes.In this instance,a reference manual would've been cool!

They upgraded my trade in value due to a better condition than I reported.  Who does that?!  They were quick to process my trade in and paid out quickly as well.  I'll definitely recommend this company to anyone wanting to sell a calculator.  Definitely a company that runs off integrity, something that is hard to find these days. Thanks again!

I sent a graphing calculator to this company and they had quoted me a buying price. When they received it they sent another offer increasing what they wanted to pay because the condition was better than I thought. That, to me, is the definition of a company being honest and having integrity and stellar customer service and should be recognized! Great job Topcalcs!

Review.Titre: Quickly processed and paid in full…
Review.Contenu: Quickly processed and paid the full quote that I was given.  Trustworthy organization!
Very easy process and received my payment within 4 days of shipping.

Review.Titre: Future in selling items has arrived.
Review.Contenu: I did get upset thinking it did not go through, It was fast and easy , and one of the new best technical way to get things done, the shipping was free, you have nothing to lose , great people and a great way to get a little cash especially around the holidays. I would tell others about this for sure.

Review.Titre: They give Fair price I give any one…
Review.Contenu: They give Fair price I give any one advice to sale unused it 84 38 and c plus thy offering you good deal

The first TI 83-Plus Lime Green edition I really wanted and ordered, was sold at a great price to begin with. When it arrived, the screen had a permanent pixelation in the top right-hand corner. I followed the return process and emailed them Friday. Since Monday was a holiday they didn't respond till Tuesday and set me up with a Blue TI 83 Plus not the one I originally wanted but hey it works 100% and at a great price! With the help provided and the short turn around I gave this a five-star rating because not only did they honor their word on the warranty/return policy. They helped me out without any hassle or grief, exchange was simple and included a return shipping label. Thank you Topcalc for taking care of me! I will definitely recommend to my classmates!

Fantastic transaction! Took 48 hours from clicking Submit Sell Back to getting paid via Venmo. Ymmv depending on ship times. Highly recommend over the hassle/fees/time consumption of eBay. Will definitely use again if the need arises!

Review.Titre: I got the highest value available…
Review.Contenu: I got the highest value available online for my almost new calculator.The shipping process was so easy, everything went so smoothly, simply awesome!
I ordered a total of 11 calculators so far and their condition was excellent. They all worked and getting batteries was a bonus. Customer service was excellent. I will be buying more. Thank you.

Sold my calculator to this company. I was offered a good price, shipping process was easy, and payout was quick! I was offered $50 for my TI-84 plus calculator. I was emailed a label and shipped. Item was delivered quickly (within 2 days of being shipped) and was paid same day as item was received by company.

Review.Titre: I was admittedly skeptical of this…
Review.Contenu: I was admittedly skeptical of this being a scam. I’ve never worked with selling back calculators, so I was pleased with being able to get a free shipping label printed out and I could easily send it out. Everything was transparent with timing (tracking on the package itself) as well the receiving of payment. Grateful for a good experience

Review.Titre: Paid top dollar of my kid's hardly used…
Review.Contenu: They made a reasonable offer for my kid's hardly used graphing calculator. Return was quick and payment was prompt. I sell online on ebay and craigs list and this was the easiest and most straightforward transaction I've ever had. Thanks Viktor!!

The process was very easy. Topcalcs send the prepaid mailing label and once they received the calculators the review process is very fast. They adjusted the price but I think that is fair.I recommend them.
Super fast and easy; priced my calc and got the labels plus your free shipping offer made it feel legit and I got my PP that same week.
Quick selling process and when my Cash App payment didn’t process; they immediately sent me the funds through Zelle. Definitely a good partner to buy & sell from!
Was able to trade in my barely used graphing calculator for $60 bucks! Got it in my cashapp within 2 days of shipping it out! Great experience!

Quick turnaround, fair price! I didn't even know such a site and buyback program existed for calculators and was pleasantly surprised at how simple the process was. I will definitely recommend to others.

Review.Titre: very easy and the transaction was quick…
Review.Contenu: very easy and the transaction was quick and went smoothly.

Review.Titre: I had a problem with the order however…
Review.Contenu: I had a problem with the order however it was ratified. Payment was made promptly. Appears to be very transparent with transaction.

Review.Titre: I had to get a calculator for my child…
Review.Contenu: I had to get a calculator for my child for school. I found the best price here. They sold out of the color I ordered and I got a call asking if I would be ok with another color. I though that was excellent customer service to get a personal call.
Customer relations is important and more when you doing business online.Trust is important when buying and selling.I find that this company is interested in customers satisfaction
This company pays well for equipment in good condition, and payment is prompt.
Was nice, works well - would’ve been nice to send a confirmation email - overall good and fast shipping
I really enjoy the speed and ease of selling old calculators to TopCalcs
Even though my offer was adjusted, still good price and appreciate the deal!
Exactly as advertised.  Very good condition and will be useful for many years to come!

Review.Contenu: Easy to sell my old graphing calculators and get some cash for them!
The communication was great and it was an easy process
Great service, they make everything very easy. Would recommend and will be using again.
I sold my brand new calculator & got the money the same day they received it in the mail. Easy & swift!
